info.name: Hacker News Readable
info.description: This is a fork of https://github.com/oskarkrawczyk/hackernews-userstyles. I changed the font to use system fonts and a few other things.
info.additionalInfo: Changelog: Update 2018-02-03: Merged PR 3 from https://github.com/losuler which fixes an issue with collapsed comment spacing. Update 2017-06-06: This is now working in Firefox 53 thanks to https://github.com/andrewcodes/hackernews-userstyles/pull/2. Update 2017-01-13: It's not currently working in Firefox. I'm not sure why. The repo is here on GitHub if you'd like to help out with that issue: https://github.com/andrewcodes/hackernews-userstyles/
